# Introduction

The 'broadcast' package provides 3 main broadcasted functionalities:

 - outer-like functions to perform broadcasted outer-computations
 - broadcasted generic functions
 - broadcasted dimensional binding
 
This guide will give an overview of each of these 3 functionalities.
